Browse our stock of Yachts for sale below or discover our key services and contact us. We have

.
description.expertise: Our team of experts will guide you through the entire process of buying or selling your vessel, ensuring a professional and transparent experience.

usedBoats.title: Used Boats
usedBoats.description: Wide selection of verified vessels in excellent condition. Find affordable used boats, from open boats to used sailboats. All our vessels undergo a rigorous inspection process to ensure their quality.

usedSailboats.title: Used Sailboats
usedSailboats.description: Extensive range of used sailboats selected and reviewed by experts. We offer the best options for buying used sailboats, from small vessels to large-length sailboats, all in excellent condition.

catamarans.title: New and Used Catamarans
catamarans.description: Specialists in catamaran sales. We have a premium selection of new and used catamarans, ideal for family navigation and charter. Personalized advice on your catamaran purchase.

luxuryYachts.title: Luxury Yachts
luxuryYachts.description: The best deals on new and used luxury yachts. Extensive catalog of premium yachts and high-end vessels. Exclusive yacht buying and selling service with personalized advice.

openBoats.title: Open Boats and Recreation
openBoats.description: Great selection of used open boats and recreational vessels. We offer premium brands like Quicksilver and other industry leaders. Perfect for enjoying safe navigation.

newBoats.title: New Boats
newBoats.description: Comprehensive service for buying new boats with the best guarantees. We work with leading shipyards to offer you new vessels of the highest quality and performance.

advantages.title: Why Choose Us?
advantages.experienceDesc: More than 15 years sailing boats and ships. Specialists in managing the sale of all types of vessels, from used boats to luxury yachts.
advantages.selectionDesc: Wide selection of vessels including used sailboats, luxury yachts, catamarans, and open boats. All our vessels are verified and in excellent condition.
advantages.supportDesc: We guide you through the entire process of buying a new or used boat. We offer personalized advice to find the perfect vessel according to your needs and budget.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We answer your questions about buying and selling vessels

usedBoatConsiderations.question: What should I consider when buying a used boat?
usedBoatConsiderations.answer: When buying used boats, it's essential to verify their general condition, documentation, and perform a technical inspection. Our team handles all these verifications, ensuring a safe purchase of used vessels. Additionally, we offer expert advice to find the boat that best suits your needs and budget.

usedSailboatProcess.question: What is the process for buying a used sailboat?
usedSailboatProcess.answer: The process of buying a used sailboat includes selecting the appropriate model, technical inspection, documentation verification, and sea trial. Our experts accompany you every step of the way, from initial search to closing the purchase, ensuring you find the perfect used sailboat.

availableBoats.question: What types of vessels do you have available?
availableBoats.answer: We have a wide variety including used boats, used sailboats, luxury yachts, catamarans, open boats, and recreational vessels. We work with both new and used vessels, including premium brands like Quicksilver and other industry leaders.

sellBoat.question: How can I sell my vessel?
sellBoat.answer: We offer a comprehensive boat buying and selling service. We handle the valuation, marketing, and management of your vessel's sale, whether it's a sailboat, yacht, catamaran, or open boat. Our goal is to get the best market price for your boat.

financing.question: Do you offer financing for vessel purchases?
financing.answer: Yes, we facilitate financing options for buying new and used boats. We work with different financial institutions to find the best solution that fits your budget, whether you're buying a luxury yacht or a more modest vessel.

cta.title: Interested in Buying or Selling a Vessel?
cta.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you

hero.title: Yacht Charter | Boat and Yachts Rentals in Menorca
hero.subtitle: Rent yachts, catamarans, and motorboats in Menorca with Menorca Yacht Brokers. Enjoy custom routes and premium services with or without a skipper.

services.title: Our Yacht Charter Services in Menorca

dailyRental.title: Daily, Weekly, or Seasonal Rentals
dailyRental.description: Total flexibility to rent a boat in Menorca, from day trips in Cala Galdana to full sea vacations aboard a luxury yacht.

thematicExcursions.title: Themed Excursions and Custom Routes
thematicExcursions.description: Explore Menorca with exclusive routes: catamaran sunsets, traditional llaut excursions, diving in crystal-clear waters, and onboard dining experiences.

withoutLicense.title: No-License Boat Rentals
withoutLicense.description: No license? No problem. We'll provide you no-license boats in Menorca so you can sail freely through paradisiacal coves like Cala’n Bosch or Fornells.

support.title: 24/7 Support During Your Charter
support.description: We guarantee assistance at all times for a worry-free nautical experience.

discover.title: Discover Luxury and Freedom at Sea
discover.description: Menorca Brokers offers you a unique sea experience with boat, motorboat, and catamaran rentals. Sail without a license, with a skipper, or aboard a luxury yacht while exploring pristine coves and dream beaches like Cala Galdana and Ciudadela.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Menorca Brokers for Your Boat Rental?

fleet.title: Varied Fleet: Yachts, Catamarans, and Boats
fleet.description: From traditional llauts to modern catamarans, we have options for all tastes and needs.

experience.title: Personalized Experience
experience.description: We tailor every rental: excursions in Cala Galdana, sailing trips in Fornells, or snorkeling routes in Menorca.

crew.title: Professional Crew or Bareboat Navigation
crew.description: Choose between renting with an expert skipper or sailing independently with a no-license boat.

routes.title: Best Routes and Destinations
routes.description: From Ciudadela to Mahón, we offer unique itineraries to discover Menorca from the sea.

faq.title: Everything You Should Know Before Renting a Boat in Menorca
faq.description: We answer your questions about boat rentals in Menorca.

licenseRequired.question: Do I need a license to rent a boat in Menorca?
licenseRequired.answer: Not always. We offer no-license boats that you can operate without prior experience. For larger vessels, a navigation license is required.

bestTimeToRent.question: What's the best time to rent a boat in Menorca?
bestTimeToRent.answer: High season runs from June to September, with ideal temperatures and calm seas. During spring and fall, there are fewer crowds and more competitive prices.

boatTypes.question: What types of boats can I rent?
boatTypes.answer: We offer traditional llauts, motorboats, catamarans, sailboats, and luxury yachts, with or without a skipper.

rentalDuration.question: Can I rent a boat for a few hours or only full days?
rentalDuration.answer: We offer hourly rentals, half-day, full-day, and weekly options to suit your preferences.

recommendedRoutes.question: What are the best boating routes around Menorca?
recommendedRoutes.answer: Top routes include Cala Galdana, Cala’n Bosch, Fornells, and Mahón Bay.

includedServices.question: What's included in the boat rental?
includedServices.answer: Depending on the boat, it may include fuel, snorkeling gear, drinks, and an optional skipper.

howToBook.question: How do I book a boat in Menorca?
howToBook.answer: You can book directly through our website or contact us for personalized assistance.

cta.title: Live an Unforgettable Experience at Sea
cta.description: Book your boat in Menorca and sail through its most iconic coves. Enjoy a no-license rental, catamaran excursions, or a luxury yacht with exclusive services.

shipSalePurchase.description: From cargo vessels to luxury yachts, we guide you through every step of the process, ensuring each operation is smooth, profitable, and satisfactory.

dryBulk.description: Specialists in handling and managing dry bulk cargo.

globalExperience.description: At Menorca Brokers, we specialize in connecting shipowners and charterers, offering comprehensive solutions for the purchase, sale, and charter of vessels.

inspections.intro:
At Menorca Yacht Brokers, we have solid experience in conducting

inspections

and

marine appraisals

. As part of our commitment to quality and transparency, we offer specialized services for both buyers and sellers of yachts and boats.

maritimeInspections.title: Maritime Inspections
maritimeInspections.description: Maritime inspections are fundamental for evaluating the condition and safety of any vessel. We follow rigorous technical procedures with international standards.

conventions.title: International Conventions
conventions.description: We work in compliance with Lloyd's Register, ensuring accurate and reliable assessment.

maritimeValuations.title: Maritime Valuations
maritimeValuations.description: We perform precise and up-to-date valuations based on our experience and current market trends.

outro.description: We take pride in offering a complete and professional maritime inspection and valuation service. Our team of experts is available to guide you through every step of the process, ensuring you make informed and safe decisions when buying, selling, or insuring your yacht.

cta.title: Need an Inspection or Valuation in Menorca?
cta.description: If you would like more information about our inspections or valuations, or to request our services, don't hesitate to contact us directly through the form on our contact page or call us at the number provided.

hero.title: Maritime Logistics in Menorca | Cargo and Customized Services

subtitle.question: Want to import or export any type of cargo?

intro.text: At Menorca Yacht Brokers, we offer a complete and personalized logistics service for importing and exporting any type of cargo. From general merchandise to specialized shipments, we manage every step of the process with precision and professionalism.

pickup.title: Origin Pickup
pickup.description: We coordinate initial ground transportation to ensure your cargo begins its journey efficiently.

documentation.title: Documentation Management
documentation.description: We ensure all permits and customs procedures are in order for a smooth process.

international.title: International Transport
international.description: We offer efficient solutions by sea, land, or air adapted to your specific needs.

delivery.title: Destination Delivery
delivery.description: We deliver your cargo directly to your customer's door, ensuring timely and secure delivery.

exw.title: EXW (Ex Works)
exw.description: We coordinate all transport from origin to destination.

fob.title: FOB (Free On Board)
fob.description: We supervise loading at the port of origin.

cif.title: CIF (Cost, Insurance, and Freight)
cif.description: We ensure the protection of your merchandise.

dap.title: DAP (Delivered at Place)
dap.description: We deliver directly to the agreed location.

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: A network of strategic partners that allows us to operate worldwide.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: We are available to resolve any incidents during transport.

costOptimization.title: Cost Optimization
costOptimization.description: We design logistics solutions that fit your budget and needs.

personalizedAttention.title: Personalized Attention
personalizedAttention.description: We adapt each shipment to the specific characteristics of your cargo.

cta.title: Need a customized logistics solution?
cta.description: Contact us to design a logistics solution tailored to you

hero.title: Maritime and Nautical Consulting: Experts at Your Service

subtitle.text2: for the maritime and nautical sector in Menorca

intro.description: At Menorca Yacht Brokers, we offer comprehensive maritime and nautical consulting services designed to help you make strategic decisions in the maritime world. Our experience and technical knowledge make us the ideal partner to solve any challenge related to the naval industry and maritime transport.

technicalConsulting.title: Technical Consulting
technicalConsulting.description: We evaluate and recommend customized solutions to optimize your maritime operations, from vessel purchase to advanced technology implementation.

legalAssistance.title: Legal and Regulatory Assistance
legalAssistance.description: We guide you in compliance with international regulations, such as the SOLAS Convention, IMDG Code, and local regulations.

feasibilityAnalysis.title: Feasibility Analysis
feasibilityAnalysis.description: We conduct economic and technical studies for new maritime projects, ensuring that each decision is based on solid data.

vesselValuation.title: Vessel Valuation
vesselValuation.description: We offer precise and objective appraisals for buying, selling, renting, or financing yachts and commercial vessels.

routePlanning.title: Route Planning and Logistics
routePlanning.description: We design strategies to optimize time and costs in your maritime transport operations.

cta.title: Need professional nautical advice?
